item.description:
• Spotify login has been fixed.
  • A New Karaoke Mode: New color & font settings. New options, such as hide on hover, and show multilingual lyrics on translation
  • NetEase Support
  • Romanize Lyrics (BETA)
  • Correctly translate to user's locale.
  • Local LRC Support
  • Better Apple Music Support
  • Better local file support
  • Choose to hide song details from menubar (and only display icon)
  • Display local file colors and album art using MusicBrainz
  • Improve fullscreen animations
  • Minor bug fixes
  • Remember to translate on startup
